classitems.description: System variable which stores the width of the current page.
classitems.name: width

classitems.description: System variable which stores the height of the current page.
classitems.name: height

classitems.description:
Suspends the calling thread for a number of milliseconds.
During a sleep period, checks at 100 millisecond intervals to see whether the sleep should be terminated.
classitems.name: delay

params.name: milliseconds
params.description: The delay time in milliseconds

classitems.description: Calls the given callback function with each story of the given document.
classitems.name: stories

params.name: doc
params.description: The document instance to iterate the stories in

params.name: cb
params.description: The callback function to call with each story, passed arguments: story, loopCount

classitems.description: Calls the given callback function with each paragraph of the given document, story or text frame.
classitems.name: paragraphs

params.name: item
params.description: The story or text frame instance to iterate the paragraphs in

params.name: cb
params.description: The callback function to call with each paragraph, passed arguments: para, loopCount

classitems.description: Calls the given callback function with each line of the given document, story, text frame or paragraph.
classitems.name: lines

params.name: item
params.description:
The document, story, text frame or paragraph instance to 
                                                  iterate the lines in

params.name: cb
params.description: The callback function to call with each line, passed arguments: line, loopCount

classitems.description: Calls the given callback function with each word of the given document, story, text frame, paragraph or line.
classitems.name: words

params.name: item
params.description:
The document, story, text frame, paragraph or line instance 
                                                       to iterate the words in

params.name: cb
params.description: The callback function to call with each word, passed arguments: word, loopCount

classitems.description: Calls the given callback function with each character of the given document, story, text frame, paragraph, line or word.
classitems.name: characters

params.name: item
params.description:
The document, story, text frame, paragraph, line or word instance to 
                                                   iterate the characters in

params.name: cb
params.description: The callback function to call with each character, passed arguments: character, loopCount

classitems.description:
Sets or possibly creates the current document and returns it. 
If the param doc is not given the current document gets set to the active document 
in the application. If no document at all is open, a new document gets created.
classitems.name: doc

params.name: doc
params.description: The document to set the current document to

classitems.description: Closes the current document.
classitems.name: close

params.name: saveOptions
params.description: The indesign SaveOptions constant

params.name: file
params.description: The indesign file instance to save the document to

classitems.description: Returns the current page and sets it if argument page is given.
classitems.name: page

params.name: page
params.description: The page or page index to set the current page to

classitems.description: Returns the current layer and sets it if argument layer is given.
classitems.name: layer

params.name: layer
params.description: The layer or layer name to set the current layer to

classitems.description: Sets the units of the document (like right clicking the rulers).
classitems.name: units

params.name: units
params.description: Supported units: PT, PX, CM, MM or IN

classitems.description: Creates a vertical guide line at the current spread and current layer.
classitems.name: guideX

params.name: x
params.description: Position of the new guide

classitems.description: Creates a horizontal guide line at the current spread and current layer.
classitems.name: guideY

params.name: y
params.description: Position of the new guide

classitems.description: Draws an ellipse (oval) in the display window. An ellipse with an equal width and height is a circle. The first two parameters set the location, the third sets the width, and the fourth sets the height.
classitems.name: ellipse

params.name: x
params.description: Location X

params.name: y
params.description: Location Y

params.name: w
params.description: Width

params.name: h
params.description: Height

return.description: New oval (n.b. in Adobe Scripting the corresponding type is Oval, not Ellipse)

classitems.description: Draws a line (a direct path between two points) to the page.
classitems.name: line

params.name: x1
params.description: Point A x-value

params.name: y1
params.description: Point A y-value

params.name: x2
params.description: Point B x-value

params.name: y2
params.description: Point B y-value

classitems.description: Draws a rectangle to the page.
classitems.name: rect

params.name: x
params.description: Position X

params.name: y
params.description: Position Y

params.name: w
params.description: Width

params.name: h
params.description: Height

classitems.description: Returns the object style with the given name. If the style does not exist it gets created.
classitems.name: objectStyle

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the object style to return.

classitems.description: Sets the color used to fill shapes.
classitems.name: fill

params.name: fillColor
params.description: Accepts a Color/swatch or a string with the name of a color. Or values: C,M,Y,K / R,G,B / Grey

classitems.description: Sets the color used to draw lines and borders around shapes.
classitems.name: stroke

params.name: strokeColor
params.description: Accepts a Color/swatch or a string with the name of a color. Or values: C,M,Y,K / R,G,B / Grey

classitems.description: Sets the tint of the color used to fill shapes.
classitems.name: fillTint

params.name: tint
params.description: Number from 0 to 100

classitems.description: Sets the tint of the color used to draw lines and borders around shapes.
classitems.name: strokeTint

params.name: tint
params.description: Number from 0 to 100

classitems.description: Creates a new RGB or CMYK color and adds the new color to the document, or gets a color by name from the document
classitems.name: color

params.name: Get
params.description: color: the color name. Create new color: R,G,B,name or C,M,Y,K,name or Grey,name. Name is always optional

classitems.description:
Calculates a color or colors between two color at a specific increment. 
The amt parameter is the amount to interpolate between the two values where 0.0 equal to the first point, 0.1 is very near the first point, 0.5 is half-way in between, etc.
N.B.: Both color must be either CMYK or RGB.
classitems.name: lerpColor

params.name: c1
params.description: Input color 1

params.name: c2
params.description: Input color 2

params.name: amt
params.description: The Amount to interpolate between the two colors

classitems.description:
Creates a text frame on the current layer on the current page in the current document. 
The text frame gets created in the position specified by the x and y parameters.
The default document font will be used unless a font is set with the textFont() function. 
The default document font size will be used unless a font size is set with the textSize() function. 
Change the color of the text with the fill() function.
The text displays in relation to the textAlign() and textYAlign() functions. 
The width and height parameters define a rectangular area.
classitems.name: text

params.name: txt
params.description: The text content to set in the text frame.

params.name: x
params.description: x-coordinate of text frame

params.name: y
params.description: y-coordinate of text frame

params.name: w
params.description: width of text frame

params.name: h
params.description: height of text frame

classitems.description:
Sets text properties to the given item. If the item is not an instance the text property can be set to, 
the property gets set to the direct descendants of the given item, e.g. all stories of a given document.

If no value is given and the given property is a string, the function acts as a getter and returns the 
corresponding value(s) in an array. This can either be an array containing the value of the concrete item 
(e.g. character) the values of the item's descendants (e.g. paragraphs of given text frame).
classitems.name: typo

params.name: item
params.description: The object to apply the property to.

params.name: property
params.description:
The text property name of an object of key/value property/value pairs.
                                  If property is a string and no value is given, the function acts as getter.

params.name: value
params.description: The value to apply to the property.

return.description:
The property value(s) if the function acts as getter or the items the property 
                             was assigned to.

classitems.description: Returns the current font and sets it if argument fontName is given.
classitems.name: textFont

params.name: fontName
params.description: The name of the font to set. Font style can be separated with a tab, e.g. Helvetica\tBold

return.description: The name of the current font.

classitems.description: Returns the current font size in points and sets it if argument pointSize is given.
classitems.name: textSize

params.name: pointSize
params.description: The size in points to set.

classitems.description: Sets the current horizontal and vertical text alignment.
classitems.name: textAlign

params.name: align
params.description:
The horizontal text alignment to set. Must be one of the InDesign Justification enum values:
                          Justification.AWAY_FROM_BINDING_SIDE
                          Justification.CENTER_ALIGN
                          Justification.CENTER_JUSTIFIED
                          Justification.FULLY_JUSTIFIED
                          Justification.LEFT_ALIGN
                          Justification.RIGHT_ALIGN
                          Justification.RIGHT_JUSTIFIED
                          Justification.TO_BINDING_SIDE

params.name: yAlign
params.description:
The vertical text alignment to set. Must be one of the InDesign VerticalJustification enum values:
                          VerticalJustification.BOTTOM_ALIGN
                          VerticalJustification.CENTER_ALIGN
                          VerticalJustification.JUSTIFY_ALIGN
                          VerticalJustification.TOP_ALIGN

classitems.description: Returns the spacing between lines of text in units of points and sets it if argument leading is given.
classitems.name: textLeading

params.name: leading
params.description:
The spacing between lines of text in units of points or the default Indesign enum 
                                  value Leading.AUTO.

classitems.description: Returns the current kerning and sets it if argument kerning is given.
classitems.name: textKerning

params.name: kerning
params.description: The value to set.

classitems.description: Returns the current tracking and sets it if argument tracking is given.
classitems.name: textTracking

params.name: tracking
params.description: The value to set.

classitems.description: Returns the character style with the given name. If the style does not exist it gets created.
classitems.name: characterStyle

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the character style to return.

classitems.description: Returns the paragraph style with the given name. If the style does not exist it gets created.
classitems.name: paragraphStyle

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the paragraph style to return.

classitems.description: Links the stories of two textframes to one story. Text of first textframe overflows to second one.
classitems.name: linkTextFrames

classitems.description:
Adds an image to the document. If the image argument is given as a string the image file  must be in the document's 
data directory which is in the same directory where the document is saved in. The image argument can also be a File 
instance which can be placed even before the document was saved.
The second argument can either be the x position of the frame to create or an instance of a rectangle, 
oval or polygon to place the image in.
If x and y positions are given and width and height are not given, the frame's size gets set to the original image size.
classitems.name: image

params.name: img
params.description: The image file name in the document's data directory or a File instance

params.name: x
params.description: The x position on the current page or the item instance to place the image in

params.name: y
params.description: The y position on the current page. Ignored if x is not a number.

params.name: w
params.description: The width of the rectangle to add the image to. Ignored if x is not a number.

params.name: h
params.description: The height of the rectangle to add the image to. Ignored if x is not a number.

return.description: The item instance the image was placed in.

classitems.description: Returns items tagged with the given label in the InDesign Script Label pane (Window -> Utilities -> Script Label).
classitems.name: findByLabel

params.name: label
params.description: The label identifier

return.description: Array of concrete PageItem instances, e.g. TextFrame or SplineItem.

classitems.description: Returns the currently selected object(s).
classitems.name: selection

classitems.description:
Reads the contents of a file and creates a String array of its individual lines. 
If the file is specified by name as String, it must be located in the document's data directory.
classitems.name: loadStrings

params.name: file
params.description: The text file name in the document's data directory or a File instance

return.description: Array of the individual lines in the given file.

classitems.description:
Writes an array of strings to a file, one line per string. This file is saved to the document's data directory.
If the given file exists it gets overridden.
classitems.name: saveStrings

params.name: file
params.description: The file name or a File instance

params.name: strings
params.description: The string array to be written

classitems.description: Run the sketch! Has to be called in every sketch a the very end of the code.
classitems.name: go
